shortdesc.ph: Configurations for an injected online stream.

section.note: Agora will soon stop the service for injecting online media streams on the client. If you have not implemented this service, Agora recommends that you do not use it. For details, see Service Sunset Plans.

plentry.pd: The width of the injected video stream. The default value is 0, which is the same width as the original stream.
The height of the injected video stream. The default value is 0, which is the same height as the original stream.
The GOP (in frames) of the injected video stream. The default value is 30 fps.
The video frame rate of the injected video stream. The default rate is 15 fps.

pd.p: The bitrate of the injected video stream. The default value is 400 Kbps.
pd.note: The setting of the video bitrate is closely linked to the resolution. If the video bitrate you set is beyond a reasonable range, the SDK sets it within a reasonable range.

pd.p: The sample rate of the injected audio stream. The default value is 48000 Hz. See .
pd.note: Agora recommends setting the default value.

pd.p: The bitrate of the injected audio stream. The default value is 48 Kbps.
pd.note: Agora recommends setting the default value.

pd.p:
The number of audio channels for the injected audio stream.
1: Mono (default)
2: Stereo
pd.note: Agora recommends setting the default value.
